name: This is my all time favorite movie!
reviewBody: I fell in love with this movie as a young kid, when it was played repeatedly on television. Sadly, I haven't seen it in years, and wish that I could find it on VHS or DVD, or that they would play in on AMC Classics occasionally. I love Gregory Peck, who did an outstanding job in playing the lead role in this classic psychological mystery. The viewer is also treated to seeing a very youthful Walter Mathau and an even younger George Kennedy. Like any well written mystery, Mirage keeps the viewer in suspense throughout, revealing the truth at the end after a journey so satisfying it leaves you wishing that it wasn't over. I highly recommend this movie if you can ever find it. If you catch it on AMC classics, etc. make sure you set your VCR. You'll be glad you did!
